message: I propose a fair split, 60/40 in my favor. Let's get this over with quickly.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. Your turn to respond!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a better deal than your previous offer. Let's find a middle ground.
I'm not budging on the 70/30 split. You're getting a good deal, but I'm not giving up more.
I'm starting to feel like this isn't going anywhere.  I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share to avoid going another round.
